tool_description: Generates an optimal course sequence plan for remaining degree requirements based on prerequisites, course availability, and student preferences.

remaining_requirements.description: Array of course codes or requirement categories still needed

completed_courses.description: Array of already completed course codes

preferred_terms.description: Preferred terms for enrollment (Fall, Spring, Summer)

target_graduation.description: Target graduation term in format 'Fall YYYY' or 'Spring YYYY'

course_priorities.description: Array of high-priority course codes to schedule early

error_messages: Invalid credit limit: max_credits_per_term must be between 6 and 24 credits.
Invalid term format: preferred_terms must contain only 'Fall', 'Spring', or 'Summer'.
Invalid graduation date: target_graduation must be in format 'Fall YYYY' or 'Spring YYYY'.
Prerequisite conflict: Some remaining requirements cannot be completed due to missing prerequisites.
Impossible timeline: Cannot complete all requirements by target graduation date with given constraints.
Course availability conflict: Some required courses are not offered in preferred terms.
usage: Provide student ID, remaining requirements, completed courses, and optional planning constraints. The tool generates a term-by-term course sequence plan.

planned_graduation.description: Projected graduation term based on the generated plan

critical_path_courses.description: Courses that must be taken in specific terms due to prerequisites

alternative_options.description: Alternative course options or scheduling adjustments
